import json

# Update Notebook 04
path04 = ''c:/anonymous-users-mooc-session-meta/notebooks/04_user_split_xuetangx.ipynb''
with open\(path04, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    nb = json.load\(f\)

for cell in nb[''cells'']:
    if ''source'' in cell:
        cell[''source''] = [line.replace\(''264K pairs, 42K users'', ''175,521 pairs, 35,792 users''\) for line in cell[''source'']]

with open\(path04, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    json.dump\(nb, f, indent=1\)
print\(''Updated Notebook 04''\)

# Update Notebook 05
path05 = ''c:/anonymous-users-mooc-session-meta/notebooks/05_episode_index_xuetangx.ipynb''
with open\(path05, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    nb = json.load\(f\)

for cell in nb[''cells'']:
    if ''source'' in cell:
        cell[''source''] = [line.replace\(''212,923 pairs, 33,736 users'', ''139,349 pairs, 28,633 users''\) for line in cell[''source'']]
        cell[''source''] = [line.replace\(''24,698 pairs, 4,217 users'', ''17,848 pairs, 3,579 users''\) for line in cell[''source'']]
        cell[''source''] = [line.replace\(''26,608 pairs, 4,218 users'', ''18,324 pairs, 3,580 users''\) for line in cell[''source'']]

with open\(path05, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    json.dump\(nb, f, indent=1\)
print\(''Updated Notebook 05''\)
")
